channel.title: MESG Orchestrator: Live on Product Hunt
channel.description:
MESG Orchestrator is an event-driven task-orchestration system that manages the connections between the events and tasks of services by following the steps described in a simple process file.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/mesg-orchestrator-live-on-product-hunt/
